Name: Extended Stay America Select Suites - St Louis - Westport - East Lackland Rd.
Description: Informal quarters with kitchens in a low-key all-suite hotel offering free Wi-Fi & breakfast.

Name: Residence Inn St. Louis Airport/Earth City
Description: Contemporary all-suite hotel with an indoor pool, plus free hot breakfast & an airport shuttle.

Name: Boone's Colonial Inn
Description: Colonial-style suites offering posh bathrooms in a boutique inn, plus fine dining & a fire pit.

Name: Ameristar Casino Resort Spa St. Charles
Description: Contemporary, all-suite casino hotel with an indoor/outdoor pool & a 1950s-themed lounge.

Name: Boone's Lick Trail Inn
Description: Uniquely decorated rooms featuring antique furniture in a circa-1840s B&B with an adjacent cottage.

Name: Hollywood Casino & Hotel St. Louis
Description: Modern rooms & suites in a bustling casino hotel offering casual & upscale dining, plus live music.

Name: Red Roof Inn St Louis - Westport
Description: Simple rooms in an unassuming hotel offering free Wi-Fi & parking, plus laundry facilities.

Name: Red Roof Inn St Louis - Florissant
Description: Low-key rooms with cable TV in an unpretentious budget hotel offering free parking & Wi-Fi.
